PSCT.Base: Tribute 2 monsters from your hand and/or field, including a Dinosaur monster; Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher Dinosaur monster from your Deck or Extra Deck, with an equal or higher ATK than the total ATK of those Tributed monsters, also for the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except Dragon, Dinosaur, Sea Serpent, or Wyrm monsters. You can only activate 1 "Beta Evolution Pill - Ultranscendance" per turn.
